column4: how does the "proprietary drivers" thing in Ubuntu work?  What is the deamon or project that's doing that job of looking for such thigns?   And why can't those drivesr just be on the install cd?
some can't beacuse of licensing, some because of political reasons
even tho they're being included for free regardless
not arguing it.  I"m gladd they still show up in my system.  Just think it's kinda funny how they are taken care of after an install is done.
